name: Aquarius
description: Represented by water: Generous, trustworth, independent, indifferent, rebelious

description: Represented by the ram: Brave, willful, productive, impulsive, impatient

name: Cancer
description: Represented by the crab: Intelligent, crafty, rational, irritable, tenacious

name: Capricorn
description: Represented by the goat: Self disciplined, persevering, serious, inflexible, hard-hearted

name: Gemini
description: Represented by the twins: Curious, skillful, humorous, restless, nervous

name: Leo
description: Represented by the lion: Dominant, courageous, idealistic, arrogant, hedonistic

name: Pisces
description: Represented by the fish: Sensible, placid, easygoing, dreamy, obsessive

name: Sagittarius
description: Represented by the crossbow: Optimistic, fair-minded, intellectual, reckless, cold-hearted

name: Scorpio
description: Represented by the scorpion: Emotional, industrious, inquisitive, jealous, compulsive

name: Taurus
description: Represented by the bull: Practical, confident, tidy, stubborn, excessive

name: Virgo
description: Represented by the child: Altruistic, adaptable, efficient, sensitive, materialistic

name: Libra
description: Represented by the scales: Fair, wise, helpful, superficial, vain
